philosophy.text: Survival, extraction, corruption, and collapse matter more than body count.
philosophy.design_intent: Force movement, reward risk, and punish hesitation.

victory_logic.withdrawal_rule: Players may voluntarily withdraw for narrative or scoring reasons.

pacing_and_escalation.escalation_trigger: If no major changes by Round 3, escalation MUST begin.

game_modes.skirmish: Small forces, tight objectives, fast escalation.
game_modes.ritual_corruption: Mystic/Thyr focus. Sacred and Haunted terrain importance.

multi_faction_logic.structure: Alternating model activation remains. Temporary alliances are allowed.

coffin_cough_pressure.title: Coffin Cough & Battlefield Destabilization
coffin_cough_pressure.scope: Warden-facing escalation rule. Not a player mechanic.
coffin_cough_pressure.overview: Sustained violence, mass death, and reckless Thyr use destabilize the Canyon. When the land is pushed too far, it responds.
coffin_cough_pressure.core_rule: Coffin Canyon does not use a numerical pressure track. Escalation is story-driven and reactive.

drawing_the_coffin_cough.timing: At the end of any round
drawing_the_coffin_cough.trigger_threshold: Two or more of the following occurred during that round
triggers: A Titan destroyed terrain, a structure, or caused forced terrain collapse
Three or more models were reduced to 0 Quality
A Leader or Hero was destroyed
A Ritual was completed on Tainted or Haunted ground
An Objective Overburned, destabilized, or catastrophically failed
drawing_the_coffin_cough.warden_guidance: Escalation is optional, but encouraged. The Canyon favors consequences.

coffin_cough_effects.selection: Choose one effect below or roll 1d6

1.name: Rolling Coffin Cough
effects: Place a 6" radius Choking zone touching any board edge
At the end of each round, it drifts 3" in a direction chosen by the Warden

2.name: Ashfall
effects: All models suffer –1 die on ranged attacks until the end of the next round

3.name: Visibility Collapse
effects: Line of Sight beyond 12" is blocked until the end of the next round
Fog blocks clarity and intent, not movement

4.name: Panic on the Wind
effects: All models must test Morale at the start of their next activation

5.name: Dead Ground
effects: One heavily contested terrain feature becomes Haunted or Unstable (Warden’s choice)

6.name: Canyon Remembers
effects: All Tainted terrain immediately escalates to Haunted

coffin_cough_pressure.design_note: Players should learn that prolonged slaughter, reckless power, and hesitation invite the storm.
